title: Active Perception with VLM
description:
A project on active perception using vision-language models (VLMs) to improve perception and classification tasks in robotics.
Done at the Institute of Intelligent Systems and Robotics ([ISIR](https://www.isir.upmc.fr/)).
Done from Jan 2025 to May 2025 as part of the [Projet AI2D](https://androide.lip6.fr/node/718) course : [Project description](https://ai2d.hosted.lip6.fr/node/742)

title: Multi agents Coordination
description:
A Multi-agent coordination project using the [JADE](https://jade.tilab.com/) / [DEDALE](https://dedale.gitlab.io/) framework.
The project involves implementing solutions for :
 - distributed exploration and mapping of an unknown environment
 - achieving tasks requiring collaboration between multiple agents
 - handling efficiently deadlocks
 - dealing with adversarial agents that can block paths and move objectives
Done from Jan 2025 to May 2025 as part of the [FoSyMa](https://androide.lip6.fr/node/21) course

title: MOSIMA
description:
THIS PROJECT IS STILL IN PROGRESS

A Multi-agent project using the [GAMA](https://gama-platform.org/) platform.
The project evaluates the realism of the utopian society from the book [Ecotopia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ecotopia) by simulating the effects of implementing its main principles on the country of France.
 The project is done in teams of 8 using the agile method.
Done from Nov 2025 to Jan 2026 as part of the [MOSIMA](https://androide.lip6.fr/node/16) course

title: Mobile App : Skyjo Tracker
description:
A mobile app for Android to track games for the card game [Skyjo](https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skyjo).
The app is written in Java using [Android Studio](https://developer.android.com/studio)
 the app includes features such as :
 - tracking games in real time by logging the player actions
 - tracking statistics for each player over sessions
 - saving games and sessions for statistics
Done from Jul 2024 to Aug 2024 for tracking games with friends and family

title: Labyrinth (Ravensburger board game) competition in C
Position estimation using ArUco tags
description: Participation at the Robotech association in Polytech Sorbonne for attempting the French Robotic Cup
